description: Cat burglar Luka breaks into the apartment of our creepy janitor, Rod Barry, in the middle of the night. Luka finds himself in a heap of trouble, as he's unwittingly entered the lair of a serial molester. Rod subdues Luka with duct tape, punishes him hard with a riding crop, and makes Luka suck his cock. Luka's first experience with a clothespin zipper leads to his blood-curdling screams. Rod tops off the day with an ass-hook for Luka, then fucks the hapless burglar while he's still tied up.
title: Predator vs. Predator
